mema wasare pawathwena anthar jathika ganitha ha widya olimpiyad tharagawaliya sandaha shri lankawa niyojanaya karamin sahabhagi wana sisun sandaha adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha (13) guwan tikatpath pirinamiya.wiwidha dakshatha thibena daruwan wadi pramanayak gramiya pradeshawala sitina bawath janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage upades matha daruwange adhyapanaya jathika mattamata osawa thabime wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kara thibena bawath adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhanamahatha amathyansha shrawanagaraye pawathi guwan tikatpath pirinamime uthsawayata ethwemin pawasiya.ehi prathipalayak washayen mema tharagawaliya sandaha sahabhagiwana sisun labaganna jayagrahana pramanayak ihala yamin pawathina bawath anek aya sithanawata wada sithana, asanawata asana, dakinawa wada dakina yana wishesha lakshana mewani dakshatha dakwana daruwan thula thibena bawath gaanawardhana mahatha penwa dunneya.mewani tharaga sandaha sahabhagiwana daruwanta anthar jathika washayen da sahayogayen katayuthu kirimata awasthawa labena bawa ki amathiwaraya wini wida penena aakarayen mema tharagawaliya sandaha sisun thora ganima sidu kara thibena bawath nagaraye daruwanta labena pahasukam me wana wita gramiya pra deshawala daruwanta da labi thibena bawa amathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya.mewara mema tharagawaliya me masa 25 wanida sita 29 wanida dakwa pilipinayedi pawathwena athara ganitha anshayen sisun 9 deneku saha widya anshayen sisun 12 deneku sahabhagi wethi.mema tharagawaliya sandaha widya anshayen 2005 sita sisun idiripath wu athara 2006 sita padakkam labaganimata awasthawa labuni.2011 wasara wana wita ran padakkam 2k ridi padakkam 7k ha lokada padakkam 2k dina gath athara 2012 wasare ran padakkam 4k ridi padakkam 8k ha lokada padakkam 6k dina ganimata awasthawata labini.esema ganitha ashayen 2011 wasare lokada padakkam 7k laba gath athara 2012 wasare ran padakkam 1k , ridi padakkam 3k ha lokada padakkam 05k dina gena thibe.ganitha anshayen mema tharagawaliya sandaha idiripath wana badulla madhya maha widyalaye nethmina pujana shamika da silwa, badulla madhya maha widyalaye samith kawishka karunathilaka , dharmaraja widyalaya, nuwara thishanka alahakon , kagalu balika widyalaya,dewmi wihanga disanayaka,dharmaraja widyalaya, nuwara uditha sandaruwan wijerathna ,mahanama widyalaya,kolambaa wasantha tharaka kodithuwakku , thakshila madhya maha widyalaya, horana chanuda anusara jayalath , hindu widyalaya, yapanaya en.
kopaya ha wedanawa mage sithata thadin danuni.

meyada itha keti kalakadi janapriya wiya.me thula athi rahasakda atha.nikolayi netowich namathi rusiyanu puwathpath kalawediya wisin liyu 'kristhus wahansege sangawunu jiwithaya' namathi granthaya 1894di kalaeli dakwu wita eeta wathikanu wirodhaya ella wiya.ema pothata awashya thorathuru labagath kashmira ha ladak aaramawalata thamada gos thorathuru soya balu bawath,notowich liyu de waradi bawath kiyamin maksmular amarikan ha engalantha puwathpath sangarawalata lipi liwiya.ema nisa maksmular maha ugathaku lesa siyalu kristhiyani sabhawan wisin uluppa dakwana ladi.aarya mathaya wadagath wune ee nisaya.
